com.simcoder.uberProd.Objects

Class RideObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simcoder.uberProd.Objects.RideObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RideObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Object of a ride It is responsible for containing all the info of the ride- It also posts the ride request, records it,...

      void pickedCustomer()
      When the driver has picked up the customer this function must be called in order to know the state of the ride.
      void postRideInfo()
      Post Ride info to the database, this write action will be triggered by the firebase functions and only then will it be available to the drivers.

        public int checkRide()

      • postRideInfo

        public void postRideInfo()
        Post Ride info to the database, this write action will be triggered by the firebase functions and only then will it be available to the drivers.

      • recordRide

        When ride is ended this function must be called in order to finish a ride
